column5: Traveling east from Winnipeg to Kenora there's a bait shop (or shops) on the south side of the road. I'd like to pick up some live bait (crawlers or leeches) to use on LOW. Does anyone know of their names and if it's worth stopping there?

[font color=green size=3][b]I would assume you are traveling on Hwy 17? There's a nice litte baitshop at Eagle River right on the south side of the road. Also Bobby's on the south side in Vermillion Bay is larger, and also busyier. I've used them both in the past.
There is Manny's Bait and tackle (closer to Kenora) and Quality baits and tackle, not sure which one is best but worth a look.

Manny's Baits, about 30 minutes east of Winnipeg on the Trans Canada is the place to go. Manny has the best crawlers, nitro crawlers and leeches in the area. Manny is a great guy too- best service of any bait shop anywhere!
